title: DEV#1 - Houdini Local Simulation
subtitle: Product Developments & Tools Development for Houdini
description: A set of Houdini utilities that enable quick local iterations on complex simulations. Focused on caching, dependency tracking, and reproducible results.
content: This development sprint introduced a lightweight job runner to orchestrate local simulation steps with reliable caching and resuming.
It integrates with PDG where possible, and falls back to a Python-based queue for single-machine workflows.
Key outcome: reduced iteration time by ~40% on typical FX shots.
